reviews.review_msg: Nice guy, but I learned nothing from Slava; the students did all the lessons, most of which were lifted from www.lessonplanspage.com.  Nothing about unit planning or logical sequencing of lessons, just rambling, random discussions and long, pointless videos.  So much more could be done with this course - what a shame.  Change of prof would help.
Cary is truly a wonderful professor. He takes the time to check in on students in and outside class. If you have any questions he is easily approachable and gives great advice.
